Method Detail

getProxyTicket

public java.lang.String getProxyTicket(java.lang.String target)
                                throws java.io.IOException
Retrieves a proxy ticket for the given target using this PGT.

Parameters:
target - - the target service for which a proxy ticket is desired.
Returns:
Proxy ticket for presentation to the given service, or null if unable to retrieve proxy ticket for given pgtIou.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - upon failure to contact CAS server.
